attributes.name: Social Vulnerability Index (SoVI) - California
attributes.description: The Social Vulnerability Index (SoVIÂ®) 2006-10 measures the social vulnerability of U.S. counties to environmental hazards. The index is a comparative metric that facilitates the examination of the differences in social vulnerability among counties.

options.cartocss: #sovi0610_al { polygon-opacity: 1; line-color: #850200; line-width: 0.1; line-opacity: 1; } #sovi0610_al[sovi0610ca3cl="High"] { polygon-fill: #C30014; line-color: #C30014;} #sovi0610_al[sovi0610ca3cl="Low"] { polygon-fill: #E08368; line-color:#E08368;} #sovi0610_al[sovi0610ca3cl="Medium"] { polygon-fill: #EFD0BB; line-color: #EFD0BB;} #sovi0610_al[sovi0610ca3cl="No Data"] { polygon-fill: transparent; line-color: transparent; }
